conversation.message:
Student_C, we acknowledge your definitive and final application, and we deeply appreciate the extraordinary persistence and unwavering commitment you have shown to School_C. As you correctly noted, the highly competitive matching process across the market has now entered its final phase, and we have completed our strategic review based on the final pool of available candidates.

While our initial assessments prioritized specific profile alignments, your sustained dedication and readiness to enroll immediately now align with our final institutional needs to fill our remaining capacity. We are prepared to move forward based on your unconditional commitment.

We are pleased to inform you that we are extending an offer of admission.
